The structure has a flat top and bottom, and the sides of the blocks are parallel to each other. The structure is symmetrical along its vertical axis. 1. **Create a new coordinate system**. The final dimensions of the first part are: - The length is 0.75 units. - The width is 0.3284 units. - The height is 0.75 units. Continue with the next parts, following the same procedure as above.
